    • Constructor Detail

      • ShiftControl

        public ShiftControl()
        Des: Default constructor of a shift object.
        Post: The user list and the shifts list are instanced. The current shift and the available shift are initialized with the code 'A00'.

      • assignShiftToUser

        public java.lang.String assignShiftToUser(java.lang.String id)
                                   throws java.lang.NullPointerException
        Des: This method assign an user, with a particular id, to a shift that is added in the shifts list.
        If the user have a active shift, the method return the same shift. If the user don't have an active shift, the method created a new shift in the list with the first available code, associated with the user's id. Pre: the user is in the users list.
        Parameters:
        id - Code of a user's identification document. id!=null.
        Returns:
        A message that confirm the shift code assigned to the user.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - When the users is not founded in the list of users.

      • searchUser

        public User searchUser(java.lang.String id)
        Des: This method search a user in the users list with his id.
        Parameters:
        id - Code of a user's identification document. id!=null
        Returns:
        User A user in the users list with the same id. If the user is not in the list, return null.

      • activeShiftOfUser

        public Shift activeShiftOfUser(java.lang.String id)
        Des: This method search an active shift, in the list shifts, with the id of its assignedUser same to the given id.
        Parameters:
        id - Code of a user's identification document. id!=null
        Returns:
        shift Is a shift corresponding to the user with the given id. (shift can be null).

      • registerNewUser

        public void registerNewUser(java.lang.String id,
                            java.lang.String idType,
                            java.lang.String name,
                            java.lang.String lastNames,
                            java.lang.String address,
                            java.lang.String phoneNumber)
                     throws EmptyDataException,
                            DoubleRegistrationException
        Des: This method create and add a new user to the users list with a given parameters, only if the parameters are valid.
        Pre: The parameters id, idType, name and last names are not empty. The user is not already registered in the users list.
        Post: The user created are added to the users list.
        Parameters:
        id - Code of a user's identification document. id!=null id!=""
        idType - Type of user identification document. idType!=null idType!=""
        name - User's name. name!=null name!=""
        lastNames - last names's user. lastNames !=null lastNames!=""
        address - User's address.
        phoneNumber - User's phone number.
        Throws:
        EmptyDataException - When a required parameter are empty.
        DoubleRegistrationException - When exist an user with the same id code.

      • existUserWithId

        public boolean existUserWithId(java.lang.String id)
        Des:This method determine if exist an user with a particular id.
        Parameters:
        id - Code of a user's identification document. id!=null
        Returns:
        A boolean value that indicate if exist a user in users list with the given id.

      • attendShift

        public void attendShift(boolean attended)
                 throws UnreservedShiftException
        Des:This method modify the shift that is in the position of the current shift. The attribute active change to false and the attribute attended is assigned.
        Pre:The shift to attend has been registered before.
        Post:The code of the 'currentShift' change to the next.
        Parameters:
        attended - It´s a boolean value that indicate if the user was attended or if he wasn't present.
        Throws:
        UnreservedShiftException - If the shift to attend has not been registered before.

      • generateReport

        public java.lang.String generateReport()
        Des:This method generate a report indicating the user corresponding to each shift, and if he was attended or not.
        Returns:
        report Is a text that contents the report of all assigned shifts. shifts!=null shifts!=""
